game.name: Trivia Vault: Celebrity Trivia
game.shortDescription: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Celebrity Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer celebrity trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault Celebrity Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer celebrity trivia questions as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.

reviewHighlights.text: 5000 identical achievements that unlock immediately and are impossible to remove because they just get added back automatically
